page.title: 18Supernatural: Amy Robsart
page.content: Amy Robsart's strange death (see Local History: Characters) gave rise to stories that her ghost haunted Cumnor Place and the surrounding area. There is a tradition that in the 18th century nine parsons came out from Oxford and exorcised her ghost which they laid to rest in the church pond which is said never to have frozen over since. Cumnor Place has long since disappeared but some local residents witin living memory have said that they have seen Amy's ghost wandering in the village, though, unlike her appearances at Cornbury Park near Charlbury, she has not apparently brought bad luck.
